title: PURCHASING INFORMATION
description:
Set of information relevant to a vendor and to a Boehringer Ingelheim purchasing organization meant to drive and contribute to processes in the area of Purchase to procure. Data are used to drive automation and provide default values when creating a purchase requisition or a purchase order.
Examples are Payment Term (30 days due net, immediate payment, ...), currency, Incoterms.

paymentTermCode.title: paymentTerms.code
paymentTermCode.description: The Code is the unique identifier of the data record for PAYMENT TERM.

purchasingOrganizationCode.title: purchasingOrganization.code
purchasingOrganizationCode.description: The Code is the unique identifier of the data record for PURCHASING ORGANIZATION.

purchasingOrganizationName.title: purchasingOrganization.term
purchasingOrganizationName.description: The Term is the PURCHASING ORGANISATION name. See description of object PURCHASING ORGANISATION for details.
